C E F G H M P R S T 

C

ClackClient - Class in main
ClackClient represents the client who is using the service.
ClackClient(String, String, int) - Constructor for class main.ClackClient
main constructor for ClackClient Takes in the username of the client, the hostname of the server computer, and port number.
ClackClient(String, String) - Constructor for class main.ClackClient
secondary constructor for ClackClient Takes in a username and hostname, but sets the port to a default value
ClackClient(String) - Constructor for class main.ClackClient
tertiary constructor for ClackClient Takes in the username of the client, sets the hostname and port to a default value
ClackClient() - Constructor for class main.ClackClient
default constructor for ClackClient sets the username to 'Anon', hostname to 'localhost', and port to 7000 using previous constructors
ClackServer - Class in main
ClackServer contains the information about the port that the client connects to and the data being sent to and received from the client It also contains a boolean value closeConnection which says if the server needs to be closed or not
ClackServer(int) - Constructor for class main.ClackServer
ClackServer(int port) is the main constructor for this class The main constructor takes a single integer port as argument and sets the port number to this value, then sets the data to be sent and received to null
ClackServer() - Constructor for class main.ClackServer
ClackServer() is the default constructor for this class The default constructor calls the main constructor with the default port 7000

E

equals(Object) - Method in class main.ClackClient
Overriding equals method to determine if a ClackClient object equals another ClackClient object
equals(Object) - Method in class main.ClackServer
equals() is overridden from the Object class and compares two ClackServer objects and tests the equality of each data member of the objects, if every data member is equivalent it returns true

F

FIXED_PORT - Variable in class main.ClackClient
 

G

getHostName() - Method in class main.ClackClient
Accessor method to get the hostname
getPort() - Method in class main.ClackClient
Accessor method to get the port number
getPort() - Method in class main.ClackServer
Returns the current value of port for the class
getUserName() - Method in class main.ClackClient
Accessor method to get the username

H

hashCode() - Method in class main.ClackClient
Overriding hashCode method to hash a ClackClient object
hashCode() - Method in class main.ClackServer
hashCode() is overridden from the Object class and creates a unique integer for this ClackServer object

T

toString() - Method in class main.ClackClient
Overriding toString method to print out a ClackClient object
toString() - Method in class main.ClackServer
toString() is overridden from the Object class and returns a string which represents all data in the ClackServer object
